text: logon ko us din se darao, jab yaatana unhen aa legee. us samay atyaachaaree log kahenge, "hamaare rab! hamen thodee-see muhalat de de. ham tere aamantran ko sveekaar karenge aur rasoolon ka anusaran karenge." kaha jaega, "kya tum isase pahale qasamen nahin khaaya karate the ki hamaara to patan hee na hoga
